thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: I placed my order for a puzzle frame and two days later received both a call and an email from White Mountain clarifying my address for delivery. Spoke with a very polite woman who took my information that ensured my Fed Ex delivery three days later (including a snow storm day!). I got that "small company" feel from the ladies in customer service! They were terrific and I'm thrilled with my perfect frame! I'll be buying from this company again AND recommending them to others without reservation! Thanks, White Mountain!
